name: hgjs_build
packageJsonDescribe: this package.json file is only for development. the real package.json file was under src/

scripts.dev-compile: yarn run prepare-compile && yarn run install-deps && yarn run raw-compile -- $1
scripts.prod-compile: yarn run prepare-compile && NODE_ENV=production yarn run raw-compile
scripts.publish: yarn run prod-compile && cd dist && yarn publish
scripts.prepare-compile: yarn run clean && yarn run dist-package-json
